A "thingstead" is a meeting place of a [[Thing (assembly)]] - the governing assembly of a Germanic society.
Danelaw is something to do with Denmark.
A "thingstead" is a meeting place of a [[Thing (assembly)]] - the governing assembly of a Germanic society.
There is no direct use of the term thingstead in Marauders, however a description of one is included.

There is a wide variety of examples of thingsteads throughout Scandanavia, ultimately a thingstead is the meeting place of a Thing, which is a "meeting of the people". In Marauders of Gor, we see an example of a Thing-fair which was the largest of the Things held, occurring Yearly around May, or Camerius by the reckoning of Ar.

Based on Norse culture, there would have been other Things held locally or regionally at other times and more often.

OOC Advices:

    A thingstead is rarely considered holy ground, unless a sim has combined a permnent thingstead with a stone circle or other sacred space. Therefore, when a Thing is not being held, the thingstead may often be used as an arena or other gathering spot.
    A thingstead that is used as an arena may also be used for formal duels.
